feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [BHS7][Dedicated Servers] - Rooms B702/B703/B707/B709 maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 10, 10:00 - 20:00 UTC

Jan 13, 21:42 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our electrical infrastructure.

Start time : 10/03/2026 10:00 UTC
End time : 10/03/2026 20:00 UTC
Service impact : Some servers located in rooms B702, B703, B707 and B709 might be temporarily unavailable from 10:30 UTC during the maintenance .
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our electrical infrastructure.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA1][Dedicated Servers] - Room G132 incident notification
entry.content:
Jan 29, 19:01 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on the Room G132 has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 29/01/2026 09:28 UTC
End time : 29/01/2026 19:00 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by an electrical equipment issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Jan 29, 15:43 UTC
Update - Ongoing Actions : Our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jan 29, 13:08 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Dedicated Servers offer in the specific room.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 29/01/2026 09:28 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : All servers in the room G132 were temporarily unavailable.
The majority of the servers are no longer impacted by the incident.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access and use their servers in the specified room.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by an electrical equipment issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

Jan 29, 09:55 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offering, which is causing temporary issue in the room G132.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 29/01/2026 09:28 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : All servers in the room G132 were temporarily unavailable.
The majority of the servers are no longer impacted by the incident.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access and use their servers in the specified room.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [AP-SOUTH-MUM][Virtual Private Servers] - VPS Authentification incident notification
entry.content:
Jan 29, 06:09 UTC
Monitoring - Service has been fully restored since 29/01/2026 05:37 UTC. Monitoring remains active to ensure long-term stability.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 29/01/2026 04:30 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : The authentication service was temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Clients were temporarily unable to authenticate on the VPS service.
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a software issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jan 29, 04:55 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an incident affecting our Virtual Private Servers offering, which is causing temporary availability issue in the AP-SOUTH-MUM region.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 29/01/2026 04:30 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : The authentication service is temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Clients wishing to authenticate on the VPS service are temporarily unavailable
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
